data.name: Updater_LatestVersionMessage
data.value: Vous utilisez la dernière version de SLM disponible.

data.name: CreateLibrary_Tooltip2
data.value: Create a Steam, Origin or SLM library at selected folder.

data.name: CloseLibrary_Tooltip2
data.value: Removes the selected library from SLM without touching files inside.

data.name: RefreshLibrary_Tooltip2
data.value: Refreshes the current status of selected library.

data.name: CloseLibrary_Tooltip3
data.value: Only available for (non-main) Origin and SLM libraries.

data.name: RemoveSelectedItemSFromIgnoreList
data.value: Supprimer les élément(s) sélectionnés de la liste d'Ignore

data.name: LibraryCleanerTooltip
data.value: Double-clicking to an item will open it's location in file explorer.

data.name: Forms_LibraryCleaner_DeleteAll_Tooltip2
data.value: Attempts to delete every folder/file in the given list.

data.name: Forms_LibraryCleaner_MoveAll_Tooltip2
data.value: Moves every folder/file in the given list to selected path.

data.name: Forms_LibraryCleaner_RefreshList_Tooltip2
data.value: Refreshes the junk list for Steam libraries.

data.name: CreateLibraryButton_Click_DirectoryIsNotSelectedForLibraryCreation
data.value: Directory is not selected for library creation.

data.name: CreateLibraryButton_Click_LibraryTypeIsNotSelectedForLibraryCreation
data.value: Library type is not selected for library creation.

data.name: CreateLibraryButton_Click_SteamLibrarySupportMustBeEnabledForThisAction
data.value: Steam Library support must be enabled for this action.

data.name: CreateLibraryButton_Click_OriginLibrarySupportMustBeEnabledForThisAction
data.value: Origin Library support must be enabled for this action.

data.name: CreateLibraryButton_Click_UplayLibrarySupportMustBeEnabledForThisAction
data.value: Uplay Library support must be enabled for this action.

data.name: Forms_Main_DonateDescription
data.value: Opens a webpage with available donation methods. Thank you for your support!

data.name: TranslateSLMDescription
data.value: Opens Crowdin project page of SLM which you can contribute to translation of SLM.

data.name: Main_DiscordGroupDescription
data.value: Opens the invitation link for SLM's Discord Group on your favorite web browser.

data.name: LibraryTypeDescription
data.value: Select a library type you would like to create of.

data.name: SortGamesBy_Tooltip2
data.value: Lets you select a sorting method for the game panel.

data.name: ViewMethodForGamePanelDesc
data.value: Lets you switch between Grid and List View for Game Panel

data.name: SearchForDesc
data.value: Lets you search for a game by it's name or appid.

data.name: AppPanel_Desc1
data.value: Double-clicking to an item will open it's location in file explorer.

data.name: AppPanel_Desc2
data.value: To copy/move a game to another library, simply drag-drop the item to the targeted library.

data.name: RemoveFromIgnoreList_Tooltip2
data.value: Removes listed items from the Ignore List

data.name: DeleteAll_Tooltip2
data.value: Every item/folder listed here will be DELETED. Use it with caution!

data.name: LibraryPanel_Tooltip
data.value: Double-clicking to an item will open it's location in file explorer.

data.name: CalculationMethodForGames_Tooltip2
data.value: ACF uses the size information provided by the app manifest file

data.name: CalculationMethodForGames_Tooltip3
data.value: Enumeration, enumarates every file and folder to get the correct size information (SLOW)

data.name: CalculationMethodForArchiveSize_Tooltip
data.value: Size Calculation Method for Compressed Archives

data.name: CalculationMethodForArchiveSize_Tooltip2
data.value: Archive Size uses the size of the compressed archive.

data.name: CalculationMethodForArchiveSize_Tooltip3
data.value: File Size in Archive enumarates each file in the archive to get the correct size information (SLOW)

data.name: CompressionLevel_Tooltip
data.value: Compression Level to use for compressing game files.

data.name: ThemeAccent_Tooltip
data.value: Preferred Theme Accent to use with SLM.

data.name: ThemeBase_Tooltip
data.value: Preferred Base Theme Colors to use with SLM.

data.name: CheckForUpdatesAtStartup_Tooltip
data.value: Attempts for a new version control at startup.

data.name: KeepSearchingOnLibraryChange_Tooltip
data.value: Keeps the searching text and search for the text in the new selected library if active.

data.name: CompactStatusDetection_Tooltip
data.value: Gets the compact status for installed games.

data.name: AdvancedCompactSizeDetection_Tooltip
data.value: Gets the correct size in disk by running compact command on folders.

data.name: Language_Tooltip
data.value: Default Language to use with SLM.

data.name: SteamUserID64
data.value: Steam UserID64 to use with SLM

data.name: SteamUserID64_Tooltip
data.value: If selected, SLM will attempt to get latest play date information for games from config file of Steam.

data.name: MoveFilesSequentiallyIfBiggerThan_Tooltip
data.value: Move files bigger than (X) MB sequentially

data.name: MoveFilesSequentiallyIfBiggerThan_Tooltip2
data.value: SLM moves files parallelly for the best performance but for bigger files it may downgrade the performance and may be best to move sequentially.

data.name: DefaultCompactLevel_Tooltip
data.value: Default compression level for compact tasks.

data.name: DefaultCompactLevel_Tooltip5
data.value: LZX = Slowest, most efficient with high overhead

data.name: OpenLogsFolder_Tooltip
data.value: SLM will attempt to open /logs/ folder in the file explorer if exists.

data.name: CheckForUpdates_Tooltip
data.value: SLM will attempt to check for updates to see if there is newer version available.

data.name: ClearHeaderImageCache_Tooltip
data.value: SLM will attempt to clear the cache for game header images cached in /.slmcache/ folder

data.name: RemoveFilesAtSourceDirectory_Tooltip
data.value: If selected and task is completed successfully (copy-first then remove), SLM will remove the copied files from source. This option can be change per-task.

data.name: CompressFiles_Tooltip
data.value: If selected, SLM will compress files. This option can be changed per-task.

data.name: ReportFileMovement_Tooltip
data.value: If selected, SLM will report file movement status to log view in the task manager. This option can be changed per-task.

data.name: StartTaskManagerAtStartup_Tooltip
data.value: If enabled, Task Manager will be started at startup.

data.name: PlayASoundOnCompletion_Tooltip
data.value: Play a Sound on Task Manager Queue Completion

data.name: PlayASoundOnCompletion_Tooltip2
data.value: SLM will attempt to play a sound (Windows exclamation or the file in CustomSoundFile setting key) on the queue of task manager gets completed.

data.name: SteamLibrarySupport_Tooltip
data.value: Enables/Disables Steam Library functionality for SLM

data.name: OriginLibrarySupport_Tooltip
data.value: Enables/Disables Origin Library functionality for SLM

data.name: UplayLibrarySupport_Tooltip
data.value: Enables/Disables Uplay Library functionality for SLM

data.name: TaskPanel_Tooltip
data.value: Double-clicking on a task will open it's location in file explorer.

data.name: StartTaskManager_Tooltip
data.value: Will start the task manager. Task Manager will process the queued items or wait for new items.

data.name: PauseTaskManager_Tooltip
data.value: Pauses task processing and active tasks.

data.name: StopTaskManager_Tooltip
data.value: Stops the task manager and cancels the active task.

data.name: ClearCompletedTasks_Tooltip
data.value: Will remove the completed tasks from the task list.

data.name: CheckForBackupUpdates_Tooltip
data.value: Will compare the games in SLM libraries with Steam libraries to find if there is any update available.

data.name: TaskManagerView_AutoScrollLogs_Tooltip
data.value: SLM will auto-scroll the logs in the logs window. It may freeze the ui if a lot of small files moved.

data.name: TaskManagerView_AutoClearCompletedTasks_Tooltip
data.value: SLM will remove the completed tasks from task manager.

data.name: TaskManagerView_ContinueOnError_Tooltip
data.value: If active, SLM will move to the next task in the list in case of an error with the active task.

data.name: TaskManagerView_SkipSteamRestartDialog_Tooltip
data.value: If active, SLM will not ask to restart Steam on Steam library related tasks.

data.name: TaskManagerView_SkipSteamRestartDialog_Tooltip2
data.value: However running Steam apps/games without restarting Steam may (and will) damage app/game installations and will require manual processing!

data.name: Welcome_Text
data.value: This installation wizard will help you set basics of SLM for first time use. Please start with selecting a default language, theme base and accent.

data.name: Welcome_Text2
data.value: Alternatively, you can close this window to use SLM's default options.

data.name: OriginUpdateAppListException
data.value: An error happened while updating game list for Origin library: {FullPath} {ex}

data.name: Uplay_UpdateAppListError
data.value: An error happened while updating game list for Uplay library: {FullPath} {ex}

data.name: CantUnloadLibraryWithActiveTask
data.value: Can't Unload {targetLibraryType} Libraries while there is an active task.

data.name: Uplay_UnauthorizedAccessExceptionMessage
